forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun bids farewell to another day, San Francisco embraces the cool embrace of evening. Tonight, the skies, adorned with a cloak of clouds, will linger close, reminding us of the city's charming unpredictability. With temperatures settling around a mild 54, a west-southwest wind dances through the streets at speeds that whisper rather than shout, but don't be misled by its gentle caress; gusts may surprise with a firmer touch. 

Tomorrow dawns with the promise of clearer skies, offering a tantalizing taste of sunshine amidst the typical coastal charm. As morning unfolds into the day, warmth briefly graces the city, peaking near 63 before tapering off into the early afternoon—the sort of day that invites a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet moment sipping coffee at a sidewalk café. Dress in layers, a lightweight jacket to shield against the breezy spirit, yet be ready to shed it when the sun boldly breaks through the cloud cover, illuminating both the waters and the vibrant tapestry of city life. As the winds carry the scent of salt and adventure, consider exploring a nearby bookshop or enjoying an impromptu park outing—it promises to be one of those days where the urban pulse resonates softly with the rhythm of nature.
